name: air-lock

effect.ruby_sapphire: While this Pokémon is in battle, weather can still be in play, but will not have any of its effects. This ability functions identically to cloud nine.
effect.emerald: While this Pokémon is in battle, weather can still be in play, but will not have any of its effects. This ability functions identically to cloud nine.
effect.firered_leafgreen: While this Pokémon is in battle, weather can still be in play, but will not have any of its effects. This ability functions identically to cloud nine.
effect.colosseum: While this Pokémon is in battle, weather can still be in play, but will not have any of its effects. This ability functions identically to cloud nine.
effect.xd: While this Pokémon is in battle, weather can still be in play, but will not have any of its effects. This ability functions identically to cloud nine.

short_effect: Negates all effects of weather, but does not prevent the weather itself.
